chores.name: Vacuum Common Areas
chores.taskDescription: Use a vacuum cleaner to clean carpets, rugs, and floors in shared spaces such as the living room, hallway, or common areas.

chores.name: Mop Floors
chores.taskDescription: Use a mop and appropriate cleaning solution to clean hard floor surfaces in common areas

chores.name: Clean the Bathroom
chores.taskDescription: Scrub and sanitize bathroom including the sink, toilet, bathtub/shower, and mirrors.

chores.name: Wipe Down Kitchen Counters and Appliances
chores.taskDescription: Clean kitchen surfaces, countertops, and appliances to remove spills, stains, and food residue.

chores.name: Wash Dishes
chores.taskDescription: Clean dirty dishes, utensils, pots, and pans either by handwashing or the dishwasher.

chores.name: Take Out the Trash and Recycling
chores.taskDescription: Empty trash bins and recycling bins and dispose of waste properly.

chores.name: Cleaning out the Refrigerator
chores.taskDescription: Remove expired food items and wipe down shelves and drawers to maintain cleanliness and prevent odors.

chores.name: Do Laundry
chores.taskDescription: Do laundry including washing clothes, drying them either in dryer, and folding them neatly for storage.

chores.name: Buy Groceries
chores.taskDescription: Visit grocery stores or markets to purchase items from the grocery list.

chores.name: Water Plants
chores.taskDescription: Give plants appropriate amount of water.

chores.name: Rake Leaves
chores.taskDescription: Use a rake to gather leaves and debris.

chores.name: Shovel Snow
chores.taskDescription: Remove snow from pathways, driveways, and sidewalks using a shovel.
